title: WTB: Eddie Collins w/ Rare Back...
author: AK11

posts.post_title: WTB: Eddie Collins w/ Rare Back...
posts.post_content: Looking to buy an Eddie Collins with a rare back, which means no Piedmont/Sweet Caporal/Old Mill/Sovereign. Prefer to be graded 1 or better but if raw would like assurance it could be graded if necessary. PM if you have one stashed around or know somewhere there is one. Thanks.

Have a collins with American Beauty in a PSA 5.

Feel free to shoot me a line if this is a consideration
[url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]
